players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I find it strange that Bob was the one found dead last night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we vote wisely."
Diana: "I believe we should focus on finding out who killed Bob last night. Let's try to gather as much information as possible during this discussion round."
You: "I believe we should all be honest and open during this discussion round to help us determine who killed Bob last night. Let's share any relevant information we may have."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie
